Cabcd: C_{a b c d} -> R_{a b c d} -  1/2 R_{a c} g_{b d} +  1/2 R_{a d} g_{b c} -  1/2 g_{a c} R_{b d} +  1/2 g_{a d} R_{b c} +  1/6 R (g_{a c} g_{b d}-g_{a d} g_{b c})
GammaU: \Gamma^{a}_{b c} ->  1/2 g^{a d} (\partial_{b}(g_{d c}) + \partial_{c}(g_{b d})-\partial_{d}(g_{b c}))
RabcdD: R_{a b c d} -> \partial_{c}(\Gamma_{a b d})-\partial_{d}(\Gamma_{a b c}) + \Gamma_{e a d} \Gamma^{e}_{b c}-\Gamma_{e a c} \Gamma^{e}_{b d}
RabcdU: R^{a}_{b c d} -> \partial_{c}(\Gamma^{a}_{b d})-\partial_{d}(\Gamma^{a}_{b c}) + \Gamma^{e}_{b d} \Gamma^{a}_{c e}-\Gamma^{e}_{b c} \Gamma^{a}_{d e}
dgab: \partial_{c}(g_{a b}) -> \Gamma^{d}_{a c} g_{d b} + \Gamma^{d}_{b c} g_{a d}
diab: \partial_{c}(g^{a b}) -> -\Gamma^{a}_{d c} g^{d b}-\Gamma^{b}_{d c} g^{a d}
